vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συνεπι-τίθημι,
help in putting on, put on still more, βάρος [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__II middle, join in attacking, τῷ Μήδῳ [NT+5th c.BC+]
__II.2 σ. τῷ ἔργῳ fall to the work together, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II.3 set upon and use to one's own advantage, σ. τῇ ἀγνοίᾳ, τῷ μίσει τινός, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
__II.4 σ. τισὶ ἁμαρτίαν lay a sin to their charge, [LXX]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to join in making an attack
vocabInfos.mediumDef: to join in making an attack
vocabInfos.stepGloss: to join in making an attack
